title: The Elves of an Ancient Future
description: In an ancient yet futuristic, dystopian Earth, there is unrest on a supercontinent called Unigard. Dark elves are pitting humans against one another, and the innocent suffer the most. As humans struggle for their independence, an elfish king, who reigns over humans who hate him, plots to kill the godly descendants of Odin of Asgard and make himself solely divine and all-powerful. When a young captain of light elf descent catches wind of the plot, it might already be too late for humanity, and his young human sweetheart.
author: Anglia Spring
